data.event: Now Hughes —a 72-year old Cooke County resident — is having a hard time understanding why a brazen group stopped and picked up the eight month old dog.

event.title: stopped and picked up the eight month

data.event: Now Hughes —a 72-year old Cooke County resident — is having a hard time understanding why a brazen group stopped and picked up the eight month old dog.
He said a few years ago he had two other dogs.

event.title: found on his doorstep one Christmas Day

data.event: One of them was a cherished pet named Heck who he found on his doorstep one Christmas Day.

event.title: One day the dog walked up

data.event: One day the dog walked up to his owner and lingered by the chair.
